summary: A young soldier killed in Vietnam inexplicably shows up to his family home one night.
cast: John Marley|Lynn Carlin|Richard Backus|Henderson Forsythe|Anya Ormsby|Jane Daly|Michael Mazes|Arthur Anderson|Arthur Bradley|David Gawlikowski|Virginia Cortez|Bud Hoey|Robert R. Cannon|Raymond Michel|Jeff Becker|Scott Becker|Greg Wells|Kevin Schweizer|Jeff Gillen|Alan Ormsby|Mal Jones|Edward Anderson|George De Vries|Bob Noble|John Bonney|Bob Clark|Hank Lowrey
title: Crimen en la noche
